meanings.definition: A product or service that is not associated with a specific brand.
meanings.sent1: I prefer buying nonbrand items because they are usually more affordable.
meanings.sent2: The store offers a variety of nonbrand products for customers to choose from.
meanings.sent3: When the nonbrand shampoo spilled all over the floor, it smelled surprisingly good.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was like a nonbrand puzzle, each piece unique but not part of a set.
meanings.sent5: The nonbrand phone case was so plain, it blended in with everything else.

meanings.definition: To not be affiliated with any particular brand.
meanings.sent1: She decided to nonbrand her clothing line to appeal to a wider audience.
meanings.sent2: The company chose to nonbrand their products to avoid any bias towards specific brands.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he would nonbrand himself to avoid being labeled as a brand ambassador.
meanings.sent4: The idea was to nonbrand the event, making it accessible to all without brand restrictions.
meanings.sent5: They wanted to nonbrand their image, standing out for their values rather than brand associations.
